task.summary: Added skeleton activity for the entry screen.
Added skeleton FragmentActivity containing navigation side bar to join between different fragment pages.
Enter button links from EnterActivity to MainActivity when clicked
Added first fragment and code necessary to make the navigation slider display the fragment.
Began to add more fragments to the navigation slider menu. Now contains Overview, Report, Budget and Transaction fragments which can be displayed in the activity.
- Finished entering fragment screens and linking to the navigation slider menu. - Changed a few design issues.
Added Account class for account objects in the SQLite database
Implemented SQLiteHelper class to help with creating, updating, deleting and viewing the Account database.
- Added Account activity to manage accounts - Account activity reads from database and then passes account id to the main activity.
- Changed Account object to be serializable so that it can be passed between Activities.

- Added new account activity for creating new accounts. - Added an Add button to link between AccountsActivity and NewAccountActivity - Added functionality to hold down and remove an account on AccountsActivity listView.
Fixed bug where account list contains multiple of the same account when back button is pressed from an activity ahead of the account list.
Fixed bug where cancel button or back button caused application to crash when on the NewAccountActivity
Fixed bug where deleting an account was not completely removing the account from the activity
- Added validation for overdraft and balance calculations. - Added the option for the user to enter minus values for the balance field
Removed unnecessary menu.xml files for fragments

MESSAGE.value: Added skeleton activity for the entry screen.
Added skeleton FragmentActivity containing navigation side bar to join between different fragment pages.
Enter button links from EnterActivity to MainActivity when clicked
Added first fragment and code necessary to make the navigation slider display the fragment.
Began to add more fragments to the navigation slider menu. Now contains Overview, Report, Budget and Transaction fragments which can be displayed in the activity.
- Finished entering fragment screens and linking to the navigation slider menu. - Changed a few design issues.
Added Account class for account objects in the SQLite database
Implemented SQLiteHelper class to help with creating, updating, deleting and viewing the Account database.
- Added Account activity to manage accounts - Account activity reads from database and then passes account id to the main activity.
- Changed Account object to be serializable so that it can be passed between Activities.

- Added new account activity for creating new accounts. - Added an Add button to link between AccountsActivity and NewAccountActivity - Added functionality to hold down and remove an account on AccountsActivity listView.
Creating a new Account now returns the user back to the AccountActivity where it is updated to the list
Fixed bug where account list contains multiple of the same account when back button is pressed from an activity ahead of the account list.
Fixed bug where cancel button or back button caused application to crash when on the NewAccountActivity
Fixed bug where deleting an account was not completely removing the account from the activity
- Added validation for overdraft and balance calculations. - Added the option for the user to enter minus values for the balance field
Removed unnecessary menu.xml files for fragments

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Removed unnecessary menu.xml files for fragments
